isis.stitle: International® DT 466E, DT 466, 530, 530E, and HT 530 Diesel Engines - Turbochargers - Remove

svcsubsecinfo.para: The turbocharger is removed prior to mounting the engine on a stand.

warning.para: To avoid serious personal injury, possible death, or damage to the engine or vehicle, read all safety instructions in the "Safety Information" section of this manual.

To avoid serious personal injury, possible death, or damage to the engine or vehicle, make sure the transmission is in neutral, parking brake is set, and wheels are blocked before doing diagnostic or service procedures on engine or vehicle.
To avoid serious personal injury, possible death, or damage to the engine, make sure that the engine and turbocharger have cooled down sufficiently.

To avoid serious personal injury, possible death, or damage to the engine or vehicle, make sure to disconnect the battery cable from the battery. Failure to remove the battery ground cable could cause an electrical arc while removing the turbocharger.
